short_summary: Database Modeller/Information Management Modeller and Information Management Architect for Health Product and Food Branch IT Plan Initiatives
description: The [department] aims to better inform Canadians to help them make healthy choices by modernizing business efficiency...
duration_in_months: Well be publishing the contract award within 90 calendar days from the closing date of the tender.
full_summary:
**Health Products and Food Branch IT Plan Initiatives**

**Solicitation Summary**

The Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) within Health Canada is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide services for the development and implementation of the Health Products and Food Branch IT Plan Initiatives. This initiative aims to improve data analytics capacity, enhance regulatory transparency, and optimize service delivery models.

**Services Required**

The contractor will be required to provide up to three (3) TBIPS Level 2 Database Modeller/Information Management Modellers (IMDB) and up to four (4) TBIPS Level 2 Information Management Architects (IMA) to offer services across HPFB on an as-needed basis. The services will include:

* Data analysis and data sharing
* Development and implementation of IT projects
* Support for the development and implementation of Investment Plan Projects

**Submission Requirements**

Bidders are required to submit a complete bid for all resource categories. The work is not currently being performed by a contracted resource.

**Notice Details**

 * **Reference Number:** cb-5510-50995324
 * **Solicitation Number:** 1000245283
 * **Publication Date:** 2023-05-12
 * **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-08 14:00:00
 * **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:

* **Name:** Matthew Gazo
* **Email:** [matthew.gazo@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.gazo@hc-sc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (613) 297-6479
